parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned when application is successful

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API system, used to identify user permission to the api

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id and API path

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if API error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if API error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: status
response_fields.description: The status of shop flash sale

response_fields.name: start_time
response_fields.description: The start time of shop flash sale

response_fields.name: end_time
response_fields.description: The end time of shop flash sale

response_fields.name: enabled_item_count
response_fields.description: The number of enabled items in shop flash sale

response_fields.name: item_count
response_fields.description: The number of items in shop flash sale
